alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire; Southern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 3:11PM EST until January 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THURSDAY TO 7 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Northern Berkshire and Southern Berkshire Counties. In Vermont, Bennington, Western Windham and Eastern Windham Counties. * WHEN...From 11 AM Thursday to 7 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute on Thursday and the morning commute on Friday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
